name: Bruno Maciel Servulo
title: Dynamics 365 Technical Specialist
summary: Microsoft-certified Technical Specialist with 15 years of experience architecting enterprise-scale Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement, Power Platform, and Azure integration solutions for Fortune 500 companies. Proven expertise in designing secure, scalable CRM architectures that reduce operational costs by up to 20% while improving system performance and user adoption.
aboutMe: My journey in technology began over 15 years ago, fueled by a curiosity for how software can optimize real-world processes. Starting as a functional consultant, I quickly realized that the true power of Dynamics CRM lay in its extensibility. This drove me to master .NET development, bridging the gap between business requirements and technical feasibility.

Throughout my career, I have specialized in large-scale enterprise implementations. I thrive in complex environments where performance and scalability are paramount. Whether it is integrating SAP with Azure Service Bus or architecting a global CRM rollout for 10,000 users, I approach every challenge with a solution-oriented mindset.

Beyond code, I am passionate about mentorship and team leadership. I believe that building great software requires building great teams. I actively mentor junior developers, conduct code reviews, and establish best practices to ensure long-term project success. My goal is to continue pushing the boundaries of the Microsoft Cloud ecosystem, delivering innovative solutions that drive business value.

experience.title: Dynamics 365 Specialist (Independent Contractor)
experience.intro: Deliver end-to-end Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement and Power Platform solutions for international enterprise clients as independent technical consultant.
responsibilities: Architect secure, cloud-native CRM solutions integrating Dynamics 365 with Azure services including Logic Apps, Azure Functions, and Service Bus for enhanced automation and scalability
Conduct technical discovery workshops and solution design sessions with C-level stakeholders to define requirements and technical architecture
Implement DevOps best practices and CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps for faster, more reliable deployments with automated testing
Design custom Power Apps solutions with complex business logic using PCF components and Canvas apps

Implemented Power Automate cloud flows handling 1,000+ daily transactions with 99.9% reliability
